Not yet. Maybe we can hang out? In the above code, I added the :hover pseudo-class selector to the .chat-item class and set the opacity property to 0.9. Additionally, I included a transition property to make the opacity change smoothly over 0.3 seconds. Feel free to adjust the transition duration or other properties to suit your preferences.
